mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENCRYPTED_LOCATION ( encrypted_latitude, encrypted_longitude, heading, altitude, speed, occur_dt, route_dir, last_stop_id, last_stop_seq, last_stop_dist, origin_accum_dist ) VALUES ( #{encryptedLatitude}, #{encryptedLongitude}, #{heading}, #{altitude}, #{speed}, #{occurDt}, #{routeDir}, #{lastStopId}, #{lastStopSeq}, #{lastStopDist}, #{originAccumDist} )
